reviewText: Get this DVD YESTERDAY!  Wow!!!!  Must have for all people of color!
I encourage you to watch this wonderful video on f=great information. you will be surprise at what you learn and keep on learning after you watch this dvd.
You have got to think out side of the Box. Not everything that you where taught in school is true. Dr. Phil Valentine does a great job of giving a good history lesson.
If not for Dr. Phil and others like him we would be in a far worse state of confusion than we are now.  He has the intellect and courage to call it like it is.  Continue your work sir.

First of all I would like to say that Dr. Phil Valentine is very "Deep" & knowlegdeable in his studies and I admire him greatly. With that said this dvd will not disappoint you all who seek the Truth about why things are the the way they are. You must judge after viewing the video for oneself.
